it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Setup

Class Setup

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Setup.Setup

  • public class Setup
extends java.lang.Object
    this class is responsable of all the intial load of configuration files, so the configuration file loading is performed only once time and all the information parsed by those configuration files are loaded into the singleton class GameConfig. configuration files are formatted in JSON.
    See Also:
    GameConfig

      void loadBonusSpace(java.lang.String path)
      this method load all the configurable action spaces' bonuses from an external JSON file and then load it into the GameConfig class

      void loadCard(java.io.Reader inputReader)
      this method encapsulate all the mechanisms which interest the management of the cards (both development card and excommunication card) before the start of the game (like the import of the cards from an external file and the preparation of the decks.

      given the file name, loadCard import the file to parse

      Loads the new game timeout and max players from a config file
      void loadConversionPoints(java.lang.String path)
      this method load all the rules applied for the final score calculation from an external JSON file and then load it into the GameConfig class
      void loadExcommunicationTrack(java.lang.String path)
      this method load the configuration of victory points on the faith track from an external JSON file and then load it into the GameConfig class

      • loadCard

        public void loadCard(java.io.Reader inputReader)
              throws java.io.IOException
        this method encapsulate all the mechanisms which interest the management of the cards (both development card and excommunication card) before the start of the game (like the import of the cards from an external file and the preparation of the decks. Each deck contains only card belonging to one specific type, and, according to the rule of the game, each one is sorted by period). .
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        JsonImporter
